taskDefinition.name: AWS EC2 Create Route Table
taskDefinition.author: support@kineticdata.com
taskDefinition.description: Creates a route table for the specified VPC. After you create a route table, you can add routes and associate the table with a subnet.For more information see the AWS Amazon Virtual Private Cloud User Guide online.

parameter.label: Dry Run
parameter.tooltip: true or false. Dry run validates user permissions. Error response will be 'DryRunOperation' if the account has the proper permissions; 'UnauthorizedOperation' if the account does not have the proper permissions.

parameter.label: VPC Id
parameter.tooltip: The ID of the VPN in which the route table will be created. Must match an existing value in AWS.
